Title: Enhances criminal investigations and prosecutions in relation to the integrity of statements of those accused of crimes
Summary: Enhances criminal investigations and prosecutions in relation to the integrity of statements of those accused of crimes and to promote confidence in the criminal justice system.
LawCode: Amd §60.45, CP L; amd §§305.2 & 344.2, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to statements of those accused of crimes to enhance criminal investigations and prosecutions and to promote confidence in the criminal justice system of this state
